report.title: Broad list of people for lookup
report.description: A list of people known to a website including both registered users and people only stored in a custom attribute.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM users u JOIN users_websites uw ON u.id = uw.user_id AND uw.site_role_id IS NOT NULL JOIN people p ON p.id = u.person_id AND p.deleted = false WHERE u.deleted = false AND #website_filter# AND lower(p.surname || ', ' || p.first_name) like lower(replace('#q#', '*', '%') || '%') UNION SELECT DISTINCT null::integer as id, v.text_value as person_name, null::text as email_address FROM sample_attribute_values v JOIN sample_attributes a on a.id=v.sample_attribute_id and a.deleted=false and a.system_function='full_name' JOIN cache_samples_functional s on s.id=v.sample_id WHERE v.deleted=false AND s.website_id in (#website_ids#) AND lower(v.text_value) like lower(replace('#q#', '*', '%') || '%') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT NULL FROM users u JOIN users_websites uw ON u.id = uw.user_id AND uw.site_role_id IS NOT NULL JOIN people p ON p.id = u.person_id AND p.deleted = false WHERE u.deleted = false AND #website_filter# AND lower(p.surname || ', ' || p.first_name) = lower(v.text_value) )
